item.title: Flash Kali Linux Image onto USB Flash drive on Windows 10 PC - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Introduction 0. Pre-preparation 0-1 Pre-preparation Reading 0-2 Download the Necessary Files 0-3 Acquire necessary devices 1. Start BalenaEtcher 2. Select File to Flash 3. Select Target Drive 4. Flash Drive Introduction This guide intends to provide a step-by-step guide with pictures of how create a bootable Linux usb.

item.title: Create & Publish a Github Pages website - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Introduction 0. Pre-preparation reading 1. Login onto GitHub 2. Creating a repository for the site 3. Creating the test site 4. Uploading your website files and folders Introduction This guide intends to provide a step-by-step guide with pictures of how to publish a GitHub Pages website and create the corresponding repository for it.

item.title: Adding a Custom Hosts File to Android - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Prologue Introduction 0. Pre-preparation 0-1 Download the Necessary Files 0-2 Confirm ADB and Android Device Drivers Installed and Functioning 7-1 Add a Custom Hosts File Prologue I have been serious about modifying my personal devices since 2017. Over the years I hadn’t found a guide that went over all the technical steps that I wanted, so I wrote my own guide.
